en: In Capernaum, Jesus teaches in the synagogue.
His words—and what follows—leave the people astonished.

lines: He went down to Capernaum, a town in Galilee,
and on the Sabbath began to teach the people.
They were amazed at his teaching,
In the synagogue there was a man possessed by an evil spirit.
“What do you want with us, Jesus of Nazareth?
Have you come to destroy us?
I know who you are—the Holy One of God!”
Then the demon threw the man down before them all
and came out without injuring him.
All the people were amazed and said to each other,
he gives orders to evil spirits and they come out!”
And the news about him spread

question.en: What do you notice about the authority Jesus demonstrates in this scene?
